website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality, gentle microfiber cloth is treated with antimicrobial to cleanse makeup brushes without damaging them.
pros: Brushes can be wiped clean back and forth across the cloth, which is contained in a metal frame
Works well with the cleansing foam from the same brand, which is sold separately
cons: Some users found it to be overpriced for what you get

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL, SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I was looking for. The dry brush clean sponge works wonderfully and helps make my morning makeup routine fast and more environmentally friendly (not using tissues and such to wipe makeup brushes while putting makeup on). The heart-shaped scrubber is not only cute, but effective. It can slide over your fingers to hold and then scrub the brush with the other hand. The three textures on the scrubber are also very helpful, as they allow use of the product on a variety of brushes. I use a spray brush cleaner containing rose water, and it works wonderfully with the scrubber. I would highly recommend this to anyone who wear makeup.
customer_reviews.author: HeartShapedSunglasses

customer_reviews.title: Color me impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical of the quick color change makeup brush cleaner, but it has been a huge success. I'm able to use the same eyeshadow brush for different colors without contaminating the colors. I am able to play around with my look and keep my brushes cleaner a bit longer. The silicone mat has been a great help, too.
customer_reviews.author: Miss A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Nifty but not novel
customer_reviews.text: This is a nifty product, but not novel by any means. It is simply a plastic-y sponge, rough enough to knock some powder off your brushes. I was hoping that it had some sort of cleaner embedded in it, but no such luck. It works well enough to switch from light colors, but definitely doesn't clean your brush enough to go from a dark color to a light color (these were also clean brushes).
customer_reviews.author: Kylie&TheCatsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, I found a good inexpensive cleaning kit for my makeup brushes. I love this little kit because it fits everywhere. I don't have much room where I store my makeup so this is perfect for me. These tools get the job done. My brushes look brand new after I finish washing them with the heart shaped cleaner. I love the color removing sponge too. You can remove the colors and reuse the brush woth no problems. I highly recommend this kit to anyone who wants a hogh quality cleaning kit and save some cash at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Very good items for a very good price
customer_reviews.text: Very good items for a very good price. The brush cleaning pan is very effective for switching colors or cleaning off a brush to cleanly blend without muddying. I didn't think the heart scrubber would get much use or be all that much better than just using my hand, but it actually is. All the different surface textures are very effective at throughly cleaning every nook and cranny of my brushes.
customer_reviews.author: VFlower2011

customer_reviews.title: Got this after seeing a you tube video. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this after seeing a you tube video. I always used a rag or tissue to due my shade switching with ok results. This thing really works I was able to switch from light to dark shades and back again without color carry over. Serves its purpose if you don't have a lot of brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it than I thought I would! It’s very easy, all you do is swirl the brush into the sponge in between colors! It’s every practical. I plan to tag this along for traveling since I wouldn’t have to carry my other products! Keep in mind this is only a dry sponge, hence dry cleaning.. so your brush will be stained but does remove excess color to avoid mixing. Once again, it’s very practical for traveling! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Saved my liner brush
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait a bit after a couple of uses to ensure accuracy. The heart cleaner is amazing! It quickly and throughly cleaned my brushes. Took a chance and tried cleaning my ruined angled liner brush (had used gel liner and cleaned it with another cleaning product but the brush would bleed black. I tried multiple products, it just wouldn't stop) and just like that my brush was like new! The eyeshadow dry sponge makes switching colors so easy. :D Love the product, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily cleans brushes and removes makeup
customer_reviews.text: This combo pack has been a great thing for cleaning my brushes and needing to clear my brush after eyeshadow application. It works very well, get's my brushes clean with a bit of dawn soap, and the eyeshadow removal can works great.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product! I used to have to wash my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I used to have to wash my makeup brushed all of the time. Now I can use the same brush over and over with different colored shadows. I just rub it across the cleaner to remove the color.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute together. I travel with the color change tin and it's just so easy and convenient to not have to carry around more than two brushes. The heart brush cleaner is adorable and makes cleaning my brushes fun. Plus I don't have to scrub them with my fingers. Overall quality products
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: It's Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Very handy, however it does take a very long time to get the color off of brushes you've been using awhile. I was also expecting, for some reason, a solution to clean the brushes with to go along with the brush cleaner. It is just a rubber scrubber and a can with a dry, hard sponge inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Works great and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Works great at only a fraction of the price of name brand stuff at department stores and sephora. I'm on a budget so I'm so happy someone makes something affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Dchen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted/needed. Nice that this came as a kit instead of having to purchase separately. AND they send cute follow-up emails. :)
customer_reviews.author: jmg

customer_reviews.title: This kit is amazing! I never clean my makeup brushes because it's ...
customer_reviews.text: This kit is amazing! I never clean my makeup brushes because it's too much of a hassle, but with this it's super easy! I love that the silicone heart has different size ridges to clean different size brushes. And the eyeshadow remover sponge really does work as well! You just swirl your brush around and the previous color is gone. Love this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian R Owen

customer_reviews.title: I really really love it
customer_reviews.text: now this is the best buy i have gotten in a long time. looked on sellers website and it looks like maybe they will come up with new things. but the price and the products it really great quality for low price, i use this every day and every other day for washing my brushes
customer_reviews.author: carmen orta

customer_reviews.title: Terrific cleaning tools
customer_reviews.text: Nice to be able to use the same brush for different make up products. The instant sponge works great. The pink silicone brush cleaner works great with baby shampoo in thoroughly cleaning all brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: She said the cleaning glove with the different ridges really does a great job cleaning her makeup brushes
customer_reviews.text: I gave this Dream Beauty Box Makeup Cleanser Kit as a gift to my daughter. What sold me was the 8 minute video I watched before purchasing this kit. My daughter loves the kit. She said the cleaning glove with the different ridges really does a great job cleaning her makeup brushes. She loves the dry cleaning sponge because her brushes get a quick cleaning and will come in handy when she's traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Ferdie

customer_reviews.title: Quick Color Cleaner is worth it alone
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really used the makeup brush cleaner(pink object) but the color changer("wire" object in tin) is absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.author: Ty Loli

customer_reviews.title: like a little present to myself
customer_reviews.text: Very cute packaging, like a little present to myself. Love the silicone cleaner: it thoroughly cleans my foundation brush, and the smooth back is great as a palette for mixing colors and clears off completely. I especially like that smooth surface to get the product "flowing" from one of those pricey powder dispensers, as I can see it on the silicone, but not my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Both pieces good
customer_reviews.text: I use one for travel. Both pieces are very washable and large enough for all brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren H

customer_reviews.title: Love these. They work so well
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They work so well. The cleaner is wonderful and thoroughly cleans my brushes.. and the quick color change is perfect for using the same brush for different colors. Love love love.
customer_reviews.author: Katie_TJ

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that I don't have to change brushes ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I don't have to change brushes every time I change colors. I hate washing my brushes so this helps me to wait a little longer between washing. Who ever thought of this concept was pretty brilliant. I haven't tried the heart shaped brush cleaner yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Swatzell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I love them both! Great duo kit! I have to wash about 100 makeup brushes in a week!! I pay a kid to help me and they love using this!!
customer_reviews.author: akmomma03

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I am able to use the same brush for multiple powder colors without physically washing my brush(s). I definitely would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Strange

customer_reviews.title: While I have a good size brush collection
customer_reviews.text: This is everything I was everything I was looking for and more! While I have a good size brush collection, I still hate trying to clean one quick to switch to another color only to realize all of the first color was never off. This is a staple in my makeup bag because it made it so easy & fast, and actually gets my brush CLEAN. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Paige tithof

customer_reviews.title: Quick brush cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Cleans really well when you don’t have enough brushes and you are applying different eye colors.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this really does take off previous shades of eyeshadow would definitely recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Completely removes all make up products in my brushes. I have not cleaned for months because I couldn't find a good make up brush cleaner. Super happy with this product and very easy to use!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My sister is really into makeup. Got her this for christmas and she loves it! The sponge thing works great for switching colors. Everything came in a really cute box. Has a really high end feel for the price.

customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this! It instantly clears the eye shadow off my brush so I can on to the next one. Definitely will buy again.

customer_reviews.text: Works great! Very cute packaging and very cute product. The color switcher is very helpful with blending different colors. Its a lot easier cleaning my brushes now.

I'm glad that I found this set- I cleaned some brushes that I haven't in a long time and they are like new again. The quick change color tin is great and it works fast.

customer_reviews.title: I love the different textured parts of the brush cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I love the different textured parts of the brush cleaner. It works great on all my brushes of all different sizes

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal and the cutest package ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a must in my opinion. The price was unbeatable. The cute heart, you place your hand in it add some water and your brush cleaner and it really cleans your brushes very well. And the color switch is perfect too and you can also clean the sponge very easily with your soap as well. Everything was packaged beautifully and arrived in the cutest little beauty box. I would def recommend this. Worth the money and does not take up much room and good for travel too!!! Thanks again😙💖

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife because she said she needed something to clean her brushes. When I mentioned water in a cup she gave me this look. Then she promptly showed me this kit. So I bought it for her and she was very happy. I am also happy because she actually uses it. Unlike the plethora of other makeup accessories piling up on her vanity this brush makeup kit will always have a use. Also, my toddler daughter loves playing with the box it came with. So it is a win win you could say.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.W

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This works better than anticipated. The color changer made a noticeable difference (I tested my brush on a kleenex afterwards and there was no color left to transfer to the kleenex) and the brush cleaner is awesome! My brushes haven't been this clean since I bought them.

customer_reviews.title: Also the silicon heart did a really awesome job of cleaning out the makeup that was really ...

Also the silicon heart did a really awesome job of cleaning out the makeup that was really deep in the bristles. I honestly don't mind cleaning my brushes now!

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost.

Dont know what I expected but it turned out to be simply a piece of black foam. This item was definitely overpriced for the actual product received. I would not order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn L.

customer_reviews.title: You'll fall in love!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not knowing if I would like it or not. I saw a makeup artist friend use it and thought, "why not?" Wow! I'm impressed. It works perfectly. There's zero color transfer and saves your brushes at the same time. It's awesome! I haven't tried the silicone mat yet but I'm sure it's just as amazing! Give this one a try. You won't be disappointed! Amazing, personable customer service also. You can't go wrong buying this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Dancing D

customer_reviews.title: Really good!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy to avoid cross contaminating your colors, wasting make up remover, or having to switch to another brush. The Quick Color change has been really successful for me after just a week of using it. I really wanted a product like this after seeing Tati use a similar product on her channel after swatching several shadows and not switching brushes. I haven't tried the silicon heart mitt yet but I'm sure it's a great product as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great option for brush cleaning !
customer_reviews.text: Great quick way to clean your brushes. Doesn’t take up much space and cleaned my brushes nicely. The brush scrubber pink heart isn’t terribly big so if you’re looking for more of a hand /mitten size: this isn’t it. But it’s perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Stewart

customer_reviews.title: A good brush cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit does just what it's supposed to do. The pink brush cleaner makes cleaning makeup brushes a breeze. I really like the size and the fact that it fits comfortably on my fingers. The black sponge does a good job of cleaning powder off brushes...makes changing eyeshadow colors a snap. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: daffodil11

customer_reviews.title: As good as Sephora but cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I had a Sephora version of this tool that was lost and I went looking for a cheaper alternative. I am happy to say that this works (for me) every bit as well as the more expensive Sephora version! I have not yet used the pink heart/wet cleaner so I can't comment on that and it wasn't really even what I was looking for - so that was the cherry on top!
customer_reviews.author: HeyCate

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift for Teenager
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gift for my teenage niece, along with a set of Malika Jafrin brushes. She loved the convenience of these brush cleaners and said they work very well. I just bought this item again for her sister to give as a Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: SMS

customer_reviews.title: SUPER CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and works perfectly! You could absolutely diy this, but why bother. Its so so cute and does what you want with you putting in any effort. I only wish the container was heavier do i could swirl with one hand. Works JUST as well as the overly expensive name brand one.
customer_reviews.author: Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: The daily brush cleaner is awesome. Works really well if you are using the same brushes to make an eyeshadow look. The silicone cleaning pad works great too. I would buy this set again, as a gift, for a makeup lover.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Cleans like a dream.
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact thing i was looking for. I'm a bit lazy so cleaning my brushes is like yanking teeth out but this makes it a very short and simple process. The little thing for the color switching is nice too!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosealie Mason

customer_reviews.title: Love this combo!
customer_reviews.text: I love this combo. The brush cleaner works great for clearing color during eye shadow application and the heart cleaner also works great for cleaning brushes. Great deal!

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used the sponge part but not the silicone cleaner yet, the sponge works great well worth the s all amount of money!!

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great to clean makeup brushes. Makes the job a lot faster than just rubbing in the palm of your hand.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! The packaging is beautiful and have off a really nice first impression. I love the heart shape of the silicon cleaner, it's so cute! It works very well without cleaner, and with cleaner it gets rid of everything 100%. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Winnie Liu

product_meta.title: Dream Beauty Box Makeup Brush Cleaner Kit – As Featured In GLAMOUR Magazine - Pink, Silicone Makeup Brush Cleaning Mat/Glove & Quick Color Change Dry Sponge - Instantly Removes Color From Brushes, S
product_meta.description:
Makeup Cleaning Duo Kit By Dream Beauty Box Recommended By Beauty Experts Worldwide, Featured In GLAMOUR Magazine



Quick Color Change Dry Sponge 

♥ Quickly removes any powder pigments from makeup brushes without the mess or hassle of using chemicals or water. This genius sponge offers a quick & effective alternative to cleaning brushes either at home or on the go, no more waiting for brushes to dry. 

♥ The sponge is 2 sided & completely reusable. It can be cleaned by washing it with warm water & soap. It can also be sprayed with a brush cleaner for a quick cleanse. 

♥ It's he perfect time & space saver. Our cute compact tin will look great on your vanity & is also perfect for travel as it allows you to take minimal brushes when on the go. 



To use - Simply swirl your makeup brush on the sponge in a circular motion until the color pigment has been removed, then move on to your next color without switching brushes…..it really is that simple! 

Pink Silicone Brush Cleaning Mitt 

♥ A compact deep cleaning device to make cleansing your makeup brushes quicker & easier than ever before. 

♥ The heart scrubbing surface features 4 unique textures making it suitable for all eye & face brushes. 

♥ A quick & effective cleaning process to thoroughly remove all traces of makeup from your brushes, without any damage. 

♥ The compact design makes it perfect for travel. 



To use - Slip fingers into the heart mitt & apply a small amount of your favorite brush cleaner. Swirl your brush on the chosen texture, then rinse & leave to air dry.
feature_bullets: ♥ LOVE BEING CREATIVE WITH MAKE UP BUT HATE THE HASSLE OF CONSTANTLY WASHING BRUSHES? - Quick Color Change Dry Sponge has it covered. Instantly removes any powder cosmetics from your make up brushes, so you can switch to any color without switching brushes.

♥ EFFICIENCY AT IT’S BEST - The perfect time & space saver makeup tool works without using any chemicals or water. No more waiting for brushes to dry before they can be used again. This compact tin is perfect for busy women on the go, you can now travel with minimal brushes!
♥ THE PERFECT GIFT FOR MAKEUP LOVERS - You're bound to impress your friends with this must have kit, that allows them to spend more time creating beautiful makeup & less time washing their brushes.

♥ BONUS DEEP CLEAN SILICONE HEART GLOVE - For when your brushes need a good, thorough wash, your handy heart steps in & does all of the hard work for you. The variety of surface textures ensure you can quickly & effectively remove all traces of make-up from any brush type & size with just a small amount of your favourite cleaning solution.
♥ LIFETIME GUARANTEE - Totally risk-free buy! If you don’t think this life changing kit is absolutely amazing, simply let us know and we’ll refund your money. No questions asked, we promise!
